subject: Baseball
Testosterone
Athletics and Sports
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball said it planned to investigate reports that linked St. Louis Cardinals outfielder Rick Ankiel and Toronto Blue Jays third baseman Troy Glaus to the purchase of performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Major League Baseball said it planned to investigate reports that linked St. Louis Cardinals outfielder Rick Ankiel and Toronto Blue Jays third baseman Troy Glaus to the purchase of performance-enhancing drugs.
